snippet: An arsonist’s attack on a Shiite mosque in a Brussels suburb left its imam dead. Authorities attributed the attack to tensions between the Shiite and Sunni communities, not to anti-Muslim feeling.
lead_paragraph: An arsonist’s attack on a Shiite mosque in a Brussels suburb left its imam dead. Authorities attributed the attack to tensions between the Shiite and Sunni communities, not to anti-Muslim feeling.

headline.main: Deadly Mosque Arson in Belgium Attributed to Sunni-Shiite Friction
headline.print_headline: Deadly Mosque Arson in Belgium Attributed to Sunni-Shiite Friction
